backend/main.mo: Primary canister with data models, maps, user profiles, announcements, mock tests, site-wide effects, and admin‑gated methods for access control and content management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades old actor state to add site-wide effect fields, popup lists, and new ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and requirements coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend files, routes, components, and visual effects.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind layer defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and animation styles including admin and effect presets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing branding, meta tags, icons, font preloads, and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router configuring all site pages, hidden routes, and layout wrapper via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/effects/AdminEff: UI card component showing effect preset metadata, icon, color, and duration for admin selection.
frontend/src/components/effects/presets/: Preset visual effect rendering layered animated aurora‑style gradients for site‑wide activation.
Generates 100 randomly styled confetti pieces and animates them falling across the screen.
Creates 50 gradient particles with random positions and fall animations.
Renders a horizontal glowing gradient that sweeps across the screen.
Applies a full‑screen pulsing overlay using a simple animated div.
Displays a shimmering gradient wave animation across the full screen.
Tracks mouse movement to spawn temporary sparkles that fade out.
Generates radial light rays rotating from the center with staggered animation delays.
frontend/src/components/effects/siteWide: Defines metadata for various site‑wide visual effects, including ids, names, durations, colors, and icons.
frontend/src/components/effects/SiteWide: Global overlay that listens to backend effect state and renders the correct visual effect component for a timed duration.
frontend/src/components/effects/useSiteW: Fetches the current active site‑wide effect from the backend using React Query with polling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements the responsive site header with logo, navigation links, login/admin buttons, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with header, footer, and the global effects layer.
frontend/src/components/media/FacebookVi: Parses a Facebook share URL to generate an embeddable video iframe with a fallback message.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Ch: Displays a grid of Demon Slayer character cards with a styled reveal animation.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Fi: Runs a timed fire‑wheel animation sequence followed by a blackout and redirects to a fake 404 page.
Displays a Fire Wheel video or YouTube clip with a timed auto-complete, falling back to a CSS fire animation if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Fo: Renders an animated forest background with drifting gradients and falling leaf emojis.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/In: Runs a timed three-phase animation sequence (falling, Muzan reveal, glitch) and triggers completion after 47 seconds.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Ma: Shows a grid of 23 manga volume cards linking to their official Viz pages.
frontend/src/config/fireWheel.ts: Defines configuration for Fire Wheel clip URL and timing values used in the overlay sequence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEasterEggClickCoun: Tracks clicks toward a threshold and triggers a callback when reached, with automatic reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useIdleDetector.ts: Monitors user activity and fires a callback after a configurable idle duration, optionally requiring initial activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication and state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoopingAudio.ts: Manages looping audio playback with auto-play handling, mute toggling, and blocked-autoplay detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive color variables for light and dark themes plus custom UI styles like neon and admin panel classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Implements an admin interface with access-code verification, effect triggers, popups, and admin-related mutations using actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays announcements with date formatting and optional video or audio content.
frontend/src/pages/CentresPage.tsx: Loads and shows centre information with phone links and includes an Easter egg redirect when no data exists.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Static page showing a placeholder message for course and fee information.
frontend/src/pages/Fake404KickoutPage.ts: Displays a stylized 404 kickout screen themed around a 'Fire Wheel' event with a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page featuring hero content, embedded Facebook videos, and feature cards promoting the institute.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, profile fetching, and profile setup with mutation-based saving and logout logic.
frontend/src/pages/MockTestsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays mock tests with filtering by content type and renders video, PDF, or text content.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a styled 404 page with a button linking back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Displays static student review cards with ratings and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/SecretForestPage.tsx: Runs an interactive easter‑egg page with idle-triggered animation sequences, audio controls, and hidden character reveal logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin support for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON capturing project state, requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata for the Saha Institute website build.
